name: Find index
description: Search through an array of items and apply the predicate formula to each item. Returns the index of the first item where the predicate formula returns TRUE

arguments.name: Formula
arguments.description: The predicate formula that each item in the array is passed to

output.description: The index of the first item in the array where the predicate formula returned TRUE. Returns -1 if the predicate formula did not return TRUE for any item.
